RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRUMMPY speed, best. INTEREST IN UR EYES steady drive. HW BOLD POLITICIAN game third. YM RAVIN DASH close throughout. STREAKIN WITH STOLI not involved. XO GRACE lost path, veered in.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 400 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG EZZY JESS popped and gone. JESS DOWN THE RAPIDS broke out, bumped, impeded foes. J BEST QUEEN hard fought loss. SENATOR SCOOT best of rest. IVYCANTOO bobbled, lost path, late run. MS VOLCAN bumped midway, gamely. IN THE ROCKIES pinched start. EL GUY veered in start. YES MIA erratic, veered in midway. TWO POLLITICAL broke out, bumped hard start, veered in. STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE START OF THE RACE, AFTER THE REVIEW JESS DOWN THE RAPIDS WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM SECOND TO LAST FOR IMPEDING FOES.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Pollitical
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped hard start, veered in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 870 Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRUITT HERRERA clear lead, drift out stretch, held on. SUCH IS LIFE slow into stride, late surge. AP SIGNATURE TRICK prompt pace, lug out turn, tired. HELLO WALTZ chased inside. CHAOTIC KENT no speed, outrun. EAR SHOT fractious gate, off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Pruitt Herrera
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, drift out stretch, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Ap Signature Trick
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, lug out turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEW YEARS LOVE pressed the pace from the inside then took the lead at the quarter pole, drew clear into the stretch and held off late outside closer. LIL MISS DE BUY stalked the pace from the two path on the backstretch then tipped in on the turn, angled out to three wide at the quarter pole for a late rally but missed. DOWNTHESTREETDEBBY had good speed for three eighths then was overtaken, tired in the stretch but held on for the show. AFLEET OKIE trailed the field around the turn and passed tired one in the stretch. SEGOVIANA chased the leader from the inside through the turn and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Miss de Buy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground turn, 3w1/4, rallied, missed

ENTRY.NAME: New Years Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led 1/4, drew clear, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Claiming Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG CREEK FIRE had no early speed then moved between horses at the three furlong marker, engaged the leaders after the eighth pole then took command at the sixteenth pole and drew clear. ATHENIAN PRINCESS went to a early clear lead then was engaged at the half mile marker to shared command to the eighth pole but was overtaken and fought gamely to the wire. CORY LOVES RAIN rushed up the rail to engage the leader at the half mile marker, shared command to the eighth pole but was overtaken and fought gamely to the wire. ISLAND BEAUTY vied for the lead from the two path to the half mile marker, fell back on the turn but made a rebid from four wide to improve position. KINSLEYS SWEET PEA chased the leaders from four or six wide and tired. PIZZA GIRL vied for the lead from the three path to the seven sixteenths pole and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Cory Loves Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, shared command turn, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Athenian Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, share command turn, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Island Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p, fell back turn, rebid 4w, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Big Creek Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, between 3/8, engaged 1/8, took cmd, 1/16, cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Victoria Polzin, Jeanne Bowers-Lepore & George Krikorian

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 6200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAUGHTY EVELYN was hustled to a clear lead and set all the pace, drew off in the stretch. HOT LIL MESS was forwardly placed on the backstretch then made a rail bid on the turn, kept on to be second best. PROMPTLY DONE raced off the pace from four wide to the turn then moved in to three wide while racing evenly. DIVA'S DIVA raced near the back to the turn while saving ground then moved up on the inside, angled out to four wide at the top of the stretch to improve position. REMARKABLE CHARM trailed the field early then moved up from three wide on the turn, angled out to mid track in the stretch but was not a factor. MY MEADOW chased the leader from the two path to mid stretch and gave way. KALLINIKI tracked the leaders to mid turn and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Diva's Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, saved ground, 4wupper, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Remarkable Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, 3wturn, mid track stretch, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Lil Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, rail bid turn, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Naughty Evelyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, set pace, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: My Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader, off pace, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYNTER'S BOY was forwardly place then move up from four wide to the turn, kept on going four wide into the stretch to take over at the three sixteenths pole and held off the late run of the inside rival. TIGER THE MAN was off the pace while saving ground through the turn then was blocked at the eighth pole and had to move to the inside rail to make the late run and missed. MY PAL prompted the pace from three wide but was empty in the stretech. RANDOM AFFAIR co-led from the two path to the top of the stretch when he was overtaken by outside rival and was outfinished. ARIMONY co-led from the inside to the top of the stretch when he was overtaken by outside rival and weakened. MASTERPIECE DAY raced near the back to the main track then rushed up from five wide to be close to the pace, raced five wide around the turn but didn't make a bid. GOOSE DRANK WINE trailed the field and was outrun. GIMME SPACE was pinched back shortly after the break and remained back. A STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE RUNNING IN MID STRETCH, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger the Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground, blocked 1/8, angled in, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Paynter's Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, move up, 4wupper, led 3/16, held on

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: C. Kidder, N. Cole, B. Kidder & R. Kinder & E. Woolsey

ENTRY.NAME: Masterpiece Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, rush up, 5wturn, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PICK A LANE FRANK was roused to the front to press the pace from the two path through the turn then took the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off. PRINCE OTTO went to a pressured lead from the inside to the quarter pole, fought gamely to mid stretch and held on to be second best. FRISCO KID raced in the middle of the pack on the backstretch then made a three wide bid around the turn and rallied in the stretch to just miss the place. FRIENDLY FOE bobbled slightly at the start, saved ground to no avail. RED WES rushed up from three wide then angled to the rail at the five furlong marker to be forwardly placed but lacked room and had to take up slightly, chased the leaders around the turn and tired. RI' PIN SNAP bobbled at the start then trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Wes
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, forwardly placed, lacked room, chased, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pick a Lane Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused, pressed pace, led 3/16, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Shawna J Whiteside, Michael Harrington& Billy S Christian
